snippet: The Giants have had a total of 20 players on injured reserve so far in their 3-9 season.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants put five players on injured reserve, including defensive end Mathias Kiwanuka and offensive linemen Geoff Schwartz and Adam Snyder, increasing team's total to 20 sidelined players; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Giants have had a total of 20 players on injured reserve so far in their 3-9 season.

headline.main: Battered Giants Put Five More on Injured Reserve List
headline.print_headline: Battered Giants Put 5 More on Their Injured Reserve List
